docs.text: CHANGELOG v1.2.0 (In Progress) Add measuring-range-exceedance warning. Add Continous Integration via Github Actions for linting, unittests and compilation of example sketches. Add classes for core and photometer for Object Oriented Programming. Rename methods for Procedural Programming. Adapt (and add new) examples to new methods. Improved documentation. Fix IDE Highlighting. v1.1.5 (2020-01-02) Definition of dependencies in library.properties to enable user-friendly installation in Arduino IDE. v1.1.4 (2019-12-10) New methods for Display Control. v1.1.3 (2019-10-24) Fix specification / Arduino Library Manager requirements. v1.1.2 (2019-10-15) Fix specification / Arduino Library Manager requirements. v1.1.1 (2019-09-30) Fix specification / Arduino Library Manager requirements. v1.1.0 (2019-09-15) Add basic methods for the use of desklab Photometer devices.

docs.text: Add measuring-range-exceedance warning. Add Continous Integration via Github Actions for linting, unittests and compilation of example sketches. Fix IDE Highlighting.
